summary: Dashboard/UI-Redesign mit goldenem Premium-Look, glasartigen Routine-Kacheln, animiertem Score-Ring und einem „Future Projection Layer“ zur Zukunftsvisualisierung der Routinen.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Abstract gold caustics light-ray overlay texture, seamless/cover-ready (gold-caustics-overlay.dim_2400x1350.png)
- Elegant futuristic human silhouette outline, minimal line art on transparent background (future-silhouette-outline.dim_512x512.png)
- Soft premium bokeh overlay texture with warm gold highlights on dark background (luxury-bokeh-overlay.dim_2400x1350.png)

existing_features.title: Update the Dashboard visual theme to a premium gold + dark jade + emerald/turquoise palette with ruby-red reserved for warnings, and apply it consistently across Dashboard surfaces (background, cards/panels, borders, highlights, icons, and interactive states) while keeping all existing functionality unchanged.

Implement a subtle animated 'gold energy source' background for the Dashboard: keep the gold background visually static overall but add a barely noticeable caustics/light-ray drift effect (e.g., a fixed full-screen overlay layer with very low opacity and slow movement).

Redesign routine sections on the Dashboard as futuristic semi-transparent glass 'Energy Capsules' with a soft glow, using completion-based fill that visually fills upward as the routine is completed (Fasting, Sleep, Training, Nutrition, Body metrics, Supplements).

Upgrade the score area to feel like a 'portal to the future': ensure the central score ring has a gentle pulse, a gold shimmer on contours, and an additional thin spark ring/particle circle that rotates slowly around it (pure CSS/SVG/canvas acceptable).

Implement the 'Future Projection Layer' as a dedicated section on the Dashboard (either above the main routine grid or in a clearly separated block), showing three panels: Biological Youth, Body Form, and Energy & Focus, each with trend indicator, numeric value, and a small elegant silhouette outline.

Apply minimal-but-impactful micro-animations across Dashboard interactions: sliders should feel fluid, supplement completion should trigger a soft wipe highlight, and saving training should trigger a brief energy pulse animation (without adding new popups or changing workflows).

new_feature_requests.summary: Goldener Hintergrund als lebendige „Energiequelle“ mit subtiler, kaum sichtbarer Licht-/Strahlenbewegung
Routinen als futuristische halbtransparente Glas-„Energie-Kapseln“ mit Glow und Füll-Animation bei Completion (Fasten, Schlaf, Training, Ernährung, Körperwerte, Supplements)
Score-Bereich als animierter Longevity/Autophagie-Ring (pulsierend) mit Gold-Schimmer und langsam rotierendem Funkenkreis
„Future Projection Layer“ im/über dem Dashboard: Visualisierung des Einflusses heutiger Routinen auf Zukunft (Biologische Jugend, Körperform, Energie & Fokus) inkl. Trends, Zahlen, Silhouette-Outline
Premium Farb- und UI-Stilguide: Gold Highlights, dunkles Jadegrün für Health, Smaragd/Türkis für Wasser/Ernährung, Rubinrot nur für Warnungen, Glas-Layer + leichtes Bokeh
Minimale aber wirkungsvolle UI-Animationen: fließende Slider, sanfter Wipe-Effekt für Supplements, kurzer Energie-Pulse beim Training-Speichern

projectName: Premium gold dashboard redesign with animated energy background, energy capsules, portal score ring, and future projection layer
